[scenario]
clients=client10026;client10027
import=helo.txt
actions=envelope-from-reject;envelope-recipient

[client10026]
port=10026
arguments=--action;reject;--envelope-from;reject@example.com

[client10027]
port=10027

[envelope-from-reject]
command=mail

from=reject@example.com

response=envelope-from
n_received=2
status=reject

froms=reject@example.com;reject@example.com

[envelope-recipient]
command=rcpt

recipient=recipient@example.com

response=envelope-recipient
n_received=0
no_command_received=true
status=reject

recipients=;;
